courses.courseDescription: Master C++ fundamentals including syntax, variables, and OOP concepts.

topics.title: What is C++?
topics.content: C++ is a general-purpose programming language that is widely used for system and application software development...

topics.title: Setting Up C++ Environment
topics.content: To write and run C++ programs, install a compiler like g++ and use an IDE like Code::Blocks or VSCode...

Data Types in C++
topics.content: C++ supports various data types like int, float, char, etc...

courses.courseDescription: Learn how to build the structure of web pages using HTML.

topics.title: What is HTML?
topics.content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It's used to structure web content...

topics.title: Basic HTML Document Structure
topics.content:
HTML documents have a standard structure. Example: ```html My First Page

Hello, world!

```

topics.title: Common HTML Tags
topics.content:
Learn about `

`, ``, `

`, and other common HTML tags...

topics.title: Using HTML Attributes
topics.content: Attributes provide additional information about elements. Example: ```html Visit Example ```

courses.courseDescription: Understand JavaScript fundamentals and how it powers interactivity on the web.

topics.title: What is JavaScript?
topics.content: JavaScript is a programming language used to create dynamic content on websites...

topics.title: Adding JavaScript to HTML
topics.content:
JavaScript can be included using `<script>` tags. Example:
```html
<script>
  alert('Hello from JavaScript!');
</script>
```

topics.title: Variables in JavaScript
topics.content: JavaScript supports `var`, `let`, and `const` for variable declarations...
